attributes.action: Reopen Gyms, Pubs And Social Activities
attributes.additional_details: For the wellbeing of myself, others and people we all care about
attributes.background: I would like parliament to reopen gyms, as you can clealry see the number of cases in covid did not rise or even begin to rise when they were reopened the first time, so why take something away that helps people with mental health, wellbeing and sometimes it's even a getaway for people.
